channel.title: Help plz!
channel.description: ok well i have been using a tuturial to make my server but what happend was when i go to run it says "you do not have a server.class.Make sure you have used the compiler wih your server BEFORE you try running it. Press any key to continue...." so plz help (for the compiler part i used mod tharaoks compiler thing)

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @hockeykid230 hockeykid230
item.description:
@hockeykid230 wrote:

OK IJUST DOWNLOADED phonescape and compiled it and it still says the same thing
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 01:39:49 PM[/size][hr]on mod tharaoks forum a kid asked the same question i am asked and this was his answer (i dont understand this so if some1 does plz tell me)“Make sure this compiler is put in the same file as your source codes. IE If I downloaded Project 16, I would open up the main source folder for P16 and put the compiler there”.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

hockeykid230:

so like u mean download another person server again??O and under sources i do see class files.

well your only missing the server.class witch is a important file as you can guess so yea your still going to need a new source… i dont know whats wrong with all these people uploading their servers for download without the correct files in them

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @hockeykid230 hockeykid230
item.description:
@hockeykid230 wrote:

so like u mean download another person server again??O and under sources i do see class files. but i am new at this so i could be looking at the wrong thing a just be thinking its class files. on mod tharaoks it said to save the compiler under the same as ur sources something like that but i dont understand what he ment by that (page 3 on his forum)

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
